author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...FERNAND EXPECTED TO BECOME POST-TROPICAL ON THURSDAY...
summary: ...FERNAND EXPECTED TO BECOME POST-TROPICAL ON THURSDAY... As of 5:00 PM AST Wed Aug 27 the center of Fernand was located near 39.3, -47.4 with movement ENE at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...FERNAND EXPECTED TO BECOME POST-TROPICAL ON THURSDAY... As of 5:00 PM AST Wed Aug 27 the center of Fernand was located near 39.3, -47.4 with movement ENE at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Fernand (AT1/AL062025)
